keyword: how many calories are in green pepper
title: How Many Calories Are in a Green Pepper?
meta_description: Learn how many calories are in green pepper, including carbs, fiber, protein, fat, and full nutrition breakdown for one medium pepper.
h1: How Many Calories Are in a Green Pepper?
assumptions: Medium-sized green bell pepper (about 119g), raw, fresh, no added seasonings.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by size, ripeness, variety, and preparation method. Check produce labels or databases for specifics.

quick_answer.text: One medium green pepper contains about 24 kcal and provides 2 g of fiber.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories are in one green pepper?
faqs.a: About 24 kcal for one medium raw green bell pepper.
Yes, one medium green pepper has 5.5 g carbs, including 2 g fiber.

faqs.q: What's the protein in a green pepper?
faqs.a: Roughly 1 g protein per medium green pepper.

faqs.q: Do green peppers have fat or cholesterol?
faqs.a: Very low fat (0.3 g) and 0 mg cholesterol per pepper.

faqs.q: How does cooking affect calories in green pepper?
faqs.a: Raw is lowest; adding oil or fillings increases calories significantly.
